message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a valuable product that I believe will be of significant benefit to you.  I understand its value to you is quite high, and I'm willing to negotiate a price that is fair for both of us.  My asking price is $1150000. This represents a substantial gain for you while still ensuring I receive a fair return on my investment. Please consider this offer carefully, as I am confident that this product will be a valuable asset to your operations.  Let me know your thoughts.
